Reference

All functions

add_forward_speed()

Add in forward speed of the storm

add_inflow()

Add inflow to direction of surface winds

add_storm_track()

Plot Atlantic basin hurricane tracks

add_wind_radii()

Add Willoughby inputs and parameters

australian_tracks

A few Australian storm tracks datasets

calc_bearing()

Calculate bearing from one location to another

calc_bearing_single()

Calculate bearing from one lat/long to another for a single point

calc_distance()

Calculate distance between two latitude / longitude points

calc_forward_speed()

Calculate storm's forward speed

calc_gradient_speed()

Convert symmetric surface wind to gradient wind.

calc_grid_wind()

Calculate wind speed at grid points

calc_grid_winds()

Calculate hurricane winds at locations

calc_gwd()

Calculate gradient wind direction at a point

calc_linear_coefs()

Calculate coefficients for linear interpolation

check_over_land()

Determine if storm is over land or water

county_points

Eastern U.S. county latitude and longitudes

create_full_track()

Impute hurricane tracks to finer time scale

find_x_section()

Find the location of a new value in a table of values

floyd_tracks

Hurricane Floyd tracks data

get_grid_winds()

Determine hurricane winds at locations

gradient_to_surface()

Calculate symmetrical surface wind from gradient wind

interp_track()

Interpolate a storm track

interpolate_line()

Interpolate new y-values using linear interpolation

interpolate_spline()

Perform spline interpolation

katrina_tracks

Hurricane Katrina tracks data

landmask

Land-sea mask

make_interp()

Make interp

mangkhut_tracks

Typhoon Mangkhut tracks data

map_wind()

Map wind exposure at the county level

remove_forward_speed()

Remove forward speed from maximum wind speed

saomai_tracks

Typhoon Saomai tracks data

solve_for_xi()

Numerically solve Willoughby Eqn. 3 for xi

summarize_grid_winds()

Generate wind summaries for grid points

will1()

Model wind speed at a grid point for a storm track observation

will2()

Calculate equation 2 from Willoughby

will3_deriv_func()

Calculate the function value and derivative for Willoughby Eqn. 3

will7a()

Calculate radius of maximum winds
